directions.step:
From: mark@alexr.co.uk
Date: Sun, 25 Feb 1996 00:00:24 GMT
Combine crumbs and margarine; press onto bottom of 9-inch springform pan. Bake at 350øF., 10 minutes. Combine cream cheese, sugar and milk, mixing at medium speed on electric mixer until well blended. Add eggs, one at a time, mixing well well after each addition. Stir in nuts; pour over crust. Bake at 350øF., 45 minutes. Loosen caek from rim of pan; cool before removing rim of pan. Chill. Before serving, top with fruit.
MM-RECIPES@IDISCOVER.NET

MM-RECIPES DIGEST V3 #56
